paper_abstract: This contribution specifies a tournament framework for computer Mahjong competitions. A first version is described in Lin, Shan, and Wu (2011). The protocol between the framework and AI programs, is also described in Lin and Wu (2010). (In Chinese) The Appendices are not directly appended to the contribution; they are accessible at http://aigames.nctu.edu.tw/mahjong/protocol.html.
paper_title: A FRAMEWORK FOR COMPUTER MAHJONG COMPETITIONS
